title: Ambassador
excerpt: IT Business Ambassador in South Korea
content: As an IT Business Ambassador (IT Park) in South Korea for the Ministry of Digital Technologies, I serve as a bridge between Uzbekistan and Korea to promote collaboration, attract investment, and introduce innovative IT solutions. My role involves supporting international partnerships, sharing best practices, and facilitating business opportunities in the tech sector. https://raqamlidunyo.itskills.uz/ambassadors

title: Simtos 2024
content: At the SIMTOS exhibition, we discussed our future collaboration and business expansion plans with our Spain, SUMEC partners, focusing on new market opportunities, technology integration, and strategic cooperation.

title: Language Exchange Event
content: We held a special event that brought together Uzbek and Korean communities to share language, traditions, and cultural experiences. Participants enjoyed interactive language sessions, traditional music and dance, cultural presentations, and fun networking activities.
